Package nl.strohalm.cyclos.setup.migrations.version3_5

Class Summary
AccountFeeLogPeriodMigration Fixes periods of scheduled fees which were generated incorrectly
AccountStatusMigration Populates the account_status and account_fee_charges tables
AccountStatusRecreationMigration Populates the account_status and account_fee_charges tables
BrokeringCommissionStatusMigration Creates a brokering commission status record for each pair (brokering / brokering commission)
BrokeringNotesMigration Migrates the field "notes" from the brokering to the contact
ChannelsMigration Creates the built-in channels
DataBaseEncodingMigration Migration of all tables to unicode character set (utf8)
FixedAccountStatusRecreationMigration Populates the account_status and account_fee_charges tables
GeneralRemarksMigration Creates a new record type named "Remark" and populates it with data from the old general remarks.
GroupHistoryLogMigration Populates the new table of group history logs based on data from group remarks
LoanCustomFieldMigration Migrates loan custom fields into payment custom fields
PasswordHashMigration Migrates the existing passwords, applying the SHA-256 hash over the MD5 hash
TransactionFeesMigration Migrate the transaction fees
